    • doWork

      public HashAggregator.AggOutcome doWork()
      Read and process (i.e., insert into the hash table and aggregate) records from the current batch. Once complete, get the incoming NEXT batch and process it as well, etc. For 1st phase, may return when an early output needs to be performed.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
